sections.text:
38-2527.Occupational therapy assistant; supervision required.

An occupational therapy assistant may deliver occupational therapy services enumerated in section 38-2510 in collaboration with and under the supervision of an occupational therapist.

SourceLaws 2004, LB 1005, ยง 125;R.S.Supp.,2006, ยง 71-6119;Laws 2007, LB463, ยง 867;Laws 2025, LB257, ยง 17.Effective Date: September 3, 2025
